privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.subtitle: How we handle your data
privacyPage.intro: Thank you for using Folder Wizard. Your privacy matters to us. This policy explains our approach to user data and the use of Google's Gemini API.

geminiSection.title: Gemini API Usage
geminiSection.content: Folder Wizard uses Google's Gemini API to provide smart organization features like suggesting new folder structures. This feature is designed to help you organize files more efficiently.

dataSentSection.title: Data Sent to API
dataSentSection.content: Data sent to Gemini API never includes your file contents. Only the following information may be sent:
dataSentSection.note: All communications use industry-standard security protocols (HTTPS/SSL).

googleDisclaimer.title: Google Data Processing
googleDisclaimer.content: Note: How Google processes data sent to Gemini API is governed by Google's own Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
googleDisclaimer.warning: Important: Folder Wizard cannot be held responsible for data breaches or security issues on Google's servers.

localProcessing.title: Local Data Handling
localProcessing.content: All file operations (moving, creating folders etc.) happen locally on your device. No data is stored permanently.

policyChanges.title: Policy Changes
policyChanges.content: We may update this policy as features change. Significant changes will be notified in-app.

setupPage.title: Welcome to Folder Wizard!
setupPage.description1: Folder Wizard is an AI-powered file organization tool designed to help you manage your files effortlessly.
setupPage.description2: To get started, please enter your Gemini API key. This key enables Folder Wizard to securely connect to Gemini's AI services and provide intelligent suggestions.
setupPage.description3: Don’t have a Gemini API key yet? You can easily get one from Gemini’s official developer portal.
setupPage.note: You won't be able to use Folder Wizard without a valid Gemini API key.

noNetworkPage.note: This page is only visible in offline mode.
